mappings.name: Determines whether a resource can be created with the specified name.

available.description: True if the name is available, otherwise false.

message.description: A message explaining why the name is unavailable. Will be null if the name is available.

name.description: The name whose availability was checked.

reason.description: The reason code explaining why the name is unavailable. Will be null if the name is available.

schema.description: A response indicating whether the specified name for a resource is available.
